name: College of Swords
description: Bards of the College of Swords weave weapon mastery and performance into a deadly art, dancing across the battlefield with dazzling flourishes.

3.name: Bonus Proficiencies
3.description: You gain proficiency with medium armor and the scimitar.

3.name: Fighting Style
3.description: You adopt a fighting style that suits your style of combat.

options.name: Dueling
options.description: When wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain a bonus to damage rolls.

options.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
options.description: You can add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack when fighting with two weapons.

3.name: Blade Flourish
3.description: When you take the Attack action, you can expend one Bardic Inspiration to perform a flourish.

options.name: Defensive Flourish
options.description: Add the Bardic Inspiration die to the weapon’s damage roll and increase your AC until the start of your next turn.

options.name: Slashing Flourish
options.description: Add the Bardic Inspiration die to the damage of the attack and deal damage to another creature nearby.

options.name: Mobile Flourish
options.description: Add the Bardic Inspiration die to the damage roll and push the target, allowing you to move with it.

6.name: Extra Attack
6.description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

14.name: Master’s Flourish
14.description: When you use a Blade Flourish, you can roll a d6 instead of expending a Bardic Inspiration die.
